name: Stunt Gal
description:
Part endless runner, part platform game, Stunt Gal is the first game in history to feature ninjas, pirates, werewolves, spiders and squirrels called Reg. Jump, swing and kick past these obstacles and get to chopper waiting on the roof before the building collapses around you.

In this game you can;
• Fall to your doom, swing on pipes, get electrocuted
• Fight ninjas, jump on aliens
• Get a cuddle from a squirrel

Music by the amazing Hey! Hello! Check them out at: http://www.heyhello.net/

Requires iPhone 4S, iPad 2/Mini or iPod touch (5th gen) or later, performance may be compromised on earlier devices.
